not as important as something else
Cost is the important thing – any benefits for the user are a secondary consideration.
be of secondary importance/be a secondary consideration
Writing was always secondary to spending time with my family.
shares, stocks etc in companies that are not considered to be the biggest or most important
The market for secondary corporate issues was quiet yesterday.
an industry or product that has developed from another industry and uses materials from that larger industry
Secondary industries turn products from farming into more useful forms, eg wool into cloth.
trading of shares, bonds etc that have already been ISSUED (=made available and sold for the first time), and which are now available on the market for other investors to buy and sell
The primary market has been out-performing the secondary market in terms of value over the past four years.
the 300,000 shares in the secondary offering
